Mandatory Pre-Registrations for High School
May 13-17 from 8 - 3:30 PM
Thursday 6:30-8:30 PM
WEBB CISD Welcomes Judge Tano Tijerina
Congratulations Oilton Elementary School Kindergarten students Graduation Class 2018!
Students learning about new wind energy program being established at WEBB CISD

div.p: Student Focused, Data driven, Results orientated

It is the policy of Webb C.I.S.D. not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, or handicap in its programs, services, or activities as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended

Webb C.I.S.D is an Equal Opportunity Employer that considers applicants for all positions, without regard to race, color, national origin, age, religion, sex, martial or veteran status, the presence of medical condition, disability, or any other legally protected status.

p.strong: We hope this message finds you and your families doing well. As you know, we are facing many challenges as we operate in this non-traditional environment.
As we continue to monitor updates from local, state and federal officials about the Novel Coronavirus, the district has determined the best course of action is to close all
Webb CISD schools until further notice.
As we move forward, we encourage you to monitor our District Website and
